description
=========================
Looney Tunes : Acme Arsenal is a game of adventure - a skill that allows us to meet with popular characters from cartoons from the Looney Tunes character . In virtual reality appears so seven figures, well-known older and younger viewers - including Bugs Bunny , Daffy Duck , Tasmanian Devil and Marvin the Martian . Among the adventurers implemented one is initially hidden , so you need to unlock it. Of course, all the characters in terms of appearance, behavior and voice persist your television and cinema counterparts .

Gameplay consists mainly of running, jumping , to fighting enemies and solving puzzles. There is also additional attractions in the form of even driving. Virtual characters received at their disposal a lot of gadgets brand Acme Corporation , known primarily adventurers Ostrich Runner and Wile E. Coyote . During the game we visit such ancient Egypt , the legendary castle of Camelot , the surface of Mars , the Wild West and the battlefield of World War II .

Looney Tunes : Acme Arsenal offers excellent entertainment for both a single user, as well as a pair - that's why implemented cooperative mode . In the version of this game for the PlayStation 2 , the latter allows you to play on a single screen .
